tweet: Same reason why Litecoin was not traded on Coinbase until the liquidity existed on GDAX. And this is just the operational aspect. There's also the brand confusion. Coinbase is targeted towards consumers. Having both Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash will cause all sorts of issues.
